DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect sevoflurane , desflurane total intravenous anaesthesia pulmonary function test patient undergo endoscopic endonasal transsphenoidal surgery pituitary gland . Participants divide three equal group . The first group receive sevoflurane , second grup receive desflurane third grup receive total intravenous anaesthesia . Investigators also go evaluate blood gas analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison The Effects Sevoflurane , Desflurane Total Intravenous Anaesthesia Pulmonary Function Tests
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators go evaluate force expiratory volume 1st Second ( FEV1 ) , force vital capacity ( FVC ) , FEV1/FVC ratio , partial pressure arterial oxygen ( PaO2 ) , partial pressure arterial carbon dioxide ( PaCO2 ) , potential hydrogen ( pH ) , arterial oxygen saturation ( SaO2 ) , base excess ( BE ) , bicarbonate ( HCO3 ) partial pressure arterial oxygen/fraction inspire oxygen ( PaO2/FiO2 ) ratio compare effect drug .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) score III patient Significant cardiopulmonary disease , Diagnosed obstructive restrictive pulmonary disease , Patients chest wall deformity , liver kidney failure , Postoperative lack cooperation
